select u.id, u.name, u.sex, u.birthday, u.mobile, u.address, u.email, u.remark, u.account, u.user_id, r.id as r_id, r.name as r_name, r.remark as r_remark from tbl_user u left join tbl_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id inner join tbl_role r on ur.role_id = r.id where u.disabled = 0
and (u.id = #{key} or u.account = #{key} or u.name like concat('%', #{key},'%') or u.mobile like concat('%', #{key},'%') )
order by id asc
